chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸, alarm set for 10 PM, croaked, "Chirp! 💊 Time!" Clementine the chick🐥 groaned, "But ribbit, I'm watching 📺!" Nights went on, froggy reminders punctually delivered. One night, zzz...Clementine slept soundly, a fluffy ball of forgetfulness. Ferdinand, in a fit of froggy responsibility, hopped onto the nightstand, snatched the syringe, and...spritzed Clementine awake with a delightful dose of cherry-flavored medicine! 🍒 "Better late than sorry," he croaked smugly. 🐸👍
